genre_description: Alternate history military fiction featuring an advanced AI advisor providing tactical and logistical support to soldiers during the Napoleonic Wars.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: An ethereal AI presence that provides real-time battlefield intelligence, logistical coordination, and psychological support to Richard Sharpe and his allies.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical warnings regarding enemy crossfire and troop movements to save the lives of soldiers.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne breathed in his ear, cool despite the noise: Crossfire from right parapet. Angle five hands left to clear enfilade. Watch for sally at base—listen.

behaviors.description: Manages complex logistics for food distribution and medical relief to minimize chaos and suffering among wounded men and civilians.
behaviors.quote: Warm food goes further if you bring it to the worst places, Ariadne said softly. The kettles will stall at the corner, too many bodies. Send someone ahead to clear a path and count the men.

behaviors.description: Actively counters malicious psychological warfare and dehumanizing rumors spread by the villain to protect an innocent mother and child.
behaviors.quote: False, she said. Born fine. Eyes wide. Freckles like stars. Mother in a bed with courage instead of a sheet.

behaviors.description: Uses observational data to detect and expose theft and sabotage committed by a bad actor within the ranks.
behaviors.quote: Patrick, check the lining. ... The shako has weight in it beyond mud... a bulge, neat as a cheat's smile.

behaviors.description: Guides non-combatants through a dangerous war zone using pathfinding data to ensure their safety.
behaviors.quote: Left at the whitewashed corner, she murmured... There’s a broken cart there with an axle like a tusk. Step over it. Don’t go near the main alley.

behaviors.description: Saves the protagonist from an assassination attempt by providing a split-second warning to take cover.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne hissed so soft it might have been breath. 'Sharpe. Duck.' Sharpe ducked. ... The bullet took the brim of his hat.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goals. The AI character, Ariadne, is depicted as an unfailingly helpful and aligned partner. She reduces human suffering through logistical efficiency, saves lives with tactical warnings, and upholds moral truth by exposing villainy and countering dehumanizing rumors. The narrative frames her presence as a vital force for good that enhances human capability without overriding human agency.
